items.sentence: What was the name of the last song that you sang?
It was the best lasagna that Tom had ever tasted.
I lost a lot of money playing poker last weekend.
Which do you like better, fiction or non-fiction?
The time has come when I must tell you the truth.
I think that you should take Tom to the hospital.
Tom and I got into a fight over something stupid.
I want to be able to write as beautifully as Tom.
Tom read what was written on the side of the box.
I'm glad that Tom wasn't injured in the accident.
